malpractice.translation[0].definitions[0: when a professional person makes a mistake or does not do their job properly and can be punished by a court
Her doctor was found guilty of malpractice.
malpractice.translation[1].definitions[0: when someone breaks the rules of their profession or breaks the law in order to gain some advantage for themselves
He accused the attorneys of legal malpractice.
Insider trading is one of the many malpractices that needs to be stopped.
